name: Ghostly Cleaning Service
description:
Enter a haunted mansion and get ready to... clean? 

Bust out your trusty vacuum cleaner and show those ghosts who's boss!

How score is calculated:

 totalScore = (scoreFromGhosts * (1 + roomsCleared) * 90/((int)CanvasUIHandler.ins.timeLeft/100)) - (4000*overHeatedCount+1);

This part was totally rushed, sorry. There should have been a larger penalty for overheating, but oh well.

Artist: Akmalhakim

Musician: Wobs

Coder: Izokia
